name: Gem 3D
description:
You are wrong if you think that jeweled games have challenges! Try GEM 3D out and you will find out!

HOW TO PLAY
The main goal is to make as many gems disappear as you can.

Tap a gem first and another gem then you would like to swap with each other. Swipe your finger left or right on the screen to rotate gems.

At least 3 gems with same shape and color has to be side by side to disappear.

Gems are placed 3x3x3 layout and gems at axis of rotation can't be selectable and movable.

A hint will help you out after 5 seconds if only one move is available.
